sentences.sentence: All the sleeping stuff wake up? Primrose, baby iris, blue phlox.
sentences.translation: 所有熟睡的都醒了——樱草花、小蝴蝶花、蓝夹竹桃。

sentences.sentence: All the sleeping things wake up-primrose, baby iris, blue phlox.
sentences.translation: 沉睡的万物全苏醒了——报春花，幼嫩的蝴蝶花，还有蓝色的福禄考花。

sentences.sentence: All the sleeping things wake up? Primrose, baby iris, blue phlox.
sentences.translation: 所有熟睡的都醒了？樱草花、小蝴蝶花、蓝夹竹桃。
